short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crexendo Click-2-Call allows you to click phone numbers in your browser and have your Crexendo device call that number!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Crexendo Click-2-Call allows you to click phone numbers in your browser and have your Crexendo device call that number!

New in this version:
Supports Microsoft Single-Sign-On for Microsoft Azure linked accounts
